Please note that this page does not update automatically. It is accurate up to the date above.

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE)
library(knitr)

options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

downdate <- "2024-06-07"
dd <- gsub("-","",downdate)

# Boatlogs
logs <- read_csv(paste0("data/ecdata",dd,"/ECMP_Boatlogs_",downdate,".csv")) %>%
   mutate(ID = paste(Fid, `Date completed`, Team, Role, Name, sep=","))

# Abiotic (Plots)
done <- read_csv(paste0("data/ecdata",dd,"/ECMP_Abiotic_all_",downdate,".csv")) %>% 
   mutate(ID = paste(Fid, `Date completed`, Team, Role, Diver, sep=","))


```
